name: Zoom 'n' Move
description:
Made In 3 days For GDKO Round 1

Zoom 'n' Move Is A Quick Puzzle Game With The Unique Ability Of Zooming And Collecting Friends. Post Your Time In The Comments Below :D

Controls: 

Aswd Or Arrow Keys To Move

Left Or Right Shift To Sprint

Space To Zoom Out

Mouse - Drag To Move the Player When Zoomed Out

Music: Jonas Tyrolller
